channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Margin of error race between Harris and Trump as 2024 election enters final stretch
item.description: Polls indicate its a margin of error race between Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump in the 2024 presidential election bat...

item.title: Harris' surge in polls riding on oversampling of Democrats, pollsters warn
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris' growing lead in the polls may be exaggerated by oversampling Democratic voters and some critics say it's an intentional ...

item.title: Digital Deception Is Bipartisan
item.description: An attempt to outline how the online world skews our perception of reality is unhelpfully partisan in its blame-casting.

item.title: Can RFK Jr.’s Anti-Establishment Coalition Help Swing The Election For Trump?
item.description: Pollsters and corporate media aren't attuned to the disaffected, hidden voting blocks bound together only by their common hatred of the establishment.

item.title: Biden claims Netanyahu not doing enough to secure deal with terrorists
item.description: President Biden said Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu is not doing enough to reach an agreement with Hamas terrorists to release hostages.

item.title: Clock ticking on Harris' campaign for a major improvement in the economy

item.title: An Out-of-Control Border Threatens Legal Immigration
item.description: The Biden–Harris administration’s failure to keep illegal immigration in check makes life harder for the kinds of immigrants America needs to attract.

item.title: Politics-Free ‘Black Myth’ Sells 10 Million In Three Days As DEI Games ‘Dustborn’ And ‘Concord’ Flop
item.description: The failures of 'Concord' and 'Dustborn' offer game developers a stark lesson: Nobody wants to buy these over-the-top woke disasters.

item.title: Biden teams up with Harris on campaign trail for 1st time since dropping re-election bid against Trump

item.title: We Are in a New Era of Pro-Abortion Extremism, at Home and Abroad
item.description: In both the U.K. and the U.S., governments are harassing pro-lifers and abortion advocates are becoming more radical.

item.title: Do The ‘Alien’ Franchise’s Anti-Corporate Themes Still Work 45 Years Later?
item.description: 'Alien: Romulus' transports the same concepts and ideas from a 45-year-old horror film into a modern context without much unpacking.

item.title: Father of Israeli-American hostage pleads for deal 'with Satan' before Biden, Harris enter Situation Room
item.description: The father of an Israeli-American still held by Hamas demanded the US and Israel broker a hostage deal "with Satan" to get the remaining 101 home.

item.title: Big Labor Bullies

item.title: Congress Should Make Universities Pay For Handing Out Useless Degrees
item.description: America’s youth are being pushed into a one-size-fits-all college track that saddles many with debt — without preparing them for careers.

item.title: Michigan becomes a top GOP Senate target as Mike Rogers ties with Dem opponent among older voters
